mapper.select: SELECT JP.JOB_POSTING_SEQ, JP.CORP_NO, JP.POSITION_SEQ, JP.POSTING_TITLE, JP.POSTING_DETAIL, JP.EXP_LEVEL, JP.POSTING_END_DT, JP.POSTING_START_DT, JP.RECRUIT_CNT, JP.EMPLOY_TYPE, JP.WORKDAY, JP.WORK_START_TIME, JP.WORK_END_TIME, JP.SALARY, JP.CONT_START_DT, JP.CONT_END_DT, JP.EDU_LEVEL, JP.VIEW_CNT, JP.ZIPCODE, JP.ROAD_ADDRESS, JP.DETAIL_ADDRESS, JP.REGION, JP.DISTRICT, P.POSITION_NAME, C.CORP_NM, C.CORP_INFO, C.CORP_URL, C.CORP_IMG, LISTAGG(DISTINCT TS.STACK_NAME, ', ') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY TS.TECH_STACK_SEQ) AS TECHNAMES FROM JOB_POSTING JP JOIN COMPANY C ON JP.CORP_NO = C.CORP_NO JOIN POSITION_CODE P ON JP.POSITION_SEQ = P.POSITION_SEQ LEFT JOIN JOB_POSTING_TECH_STACK JPTS ON JP.JOB_POSTING_SEQ = JPTS.JOB_POSTING_SEQ LEFT JOIN TECH_STACK TS ON JPTS.TECH_STACK_SEQ = TS.TECH_STACK_SEQ WHERE (LOWER(JP.POSTING_TITLE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(JP.POSTING_DETAIL) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%' OR LOWER(C.CORP_NM) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{keyword}) || '%') AND JP.IS_ENDED = 'N' AND TO_DATE(JP.POSTING_END_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') >= TRUNC(SYSDATE) GROUP BY JP.JOB_POSTING_SEQ, JP.CORP_NO, JP.POSITION_SEQ, JP.POSTING_TITLE, JP.POSTING_DETAIL, JP.EXP_LEVEL, JP.POSTING_END_DT, JP.POSTING_START_DT, JP.RECRUIT_CNT, JP.EMPLOY_TYPE, JP.WORKDAY, JP.WORK_START_TIME, JP.WORK_END_TIME, JP.SALARY, JP.CONT_START_DT, JP.CONT_END_DT, JP.EDU_LEVEL, JP.VIEW_CNT, JP.ZIPCODE, JP.ROAD_ADDRESS, JP.DETAIL_ADDRESS, JP.REGION, JP.DISTRICT, P.POSITION_NAME, C.CORP_NM, C.CORP_INFO, C.CORP_URL, C.CORP_IMG

SELECT DISTINCT JP.POSTING_TITLE AS suggestion FROM JOB_POSTING JP WHERE LOWER(JP.POSTING_TITLE) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{term}) || '%'
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT C.CORP_NM AS suggestion FROM COMPANY C WHERE LOWER(C.CORP_NM) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{term}) || '%'
UNION
SELECT DISTINCT PC.POSITION_NAME AS suggestion FROM POSITION_CODE PC WHERE LOWER(PC.POSITION_NAME) LIKE '%' || LOWER(#{term}) || '%'
